"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5529d7486368722372f91400#post_5529d7486368722372f91400
Okay, so I went to this place where I had my _procedure_ done. And I show them a curved barbell I bought a few months ago. I look at the guy and say "I need this gauge but longer." So he goes through the jewelry he has on hand, and after about five minutes of looking he looks at me and says "We don't have anything longer. We'll probably have to measure you and custom order it." Apparently my dick is too gargantuan for a normal curved barbell!
